scripts.setup:fontawesome: npm config set "@fortawesome:registry" https://npm.fontawesome.com/ && npm config set "//npm.fontawesome.com/:_authToken" 544BB5A6-F30A-4B09-8A35-F8DC7580BD4E
scripts.build:contracts: cd contracts && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:dapi: cd dapi && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test:contracts: cd contracts && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:dapi: cd dapi && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.assemble: rm -Rf dapi/contracts; mkdir -p dapi/contracts; mv contracts/build dapi/contracts/artifacts; mv contracts/types/* dapi/src/types/
scripts.prepublishOnly: VERSION=`cat package.json | jq ".version"`; cd dapi; cat package.json | jq ".version = ${VERSION}" > package-new.json && mv package-new.json package.json && cd .. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=${NPM_TOKEN} --cache-from databrokerdao/dxc:latest -t databroker/dxc ./dapi
